title: Hush, Hush Collection: Hush, Hush / Crescendo / Silence
description: Nora is drawn to patch against her better judgement. Together they embark on a romance which transcends the boundaries between heaven and earth. But being with Patch places Nora right in the middle of a centuries-old battle between the immortal and those that have fallen - and now she and Patch must face down a villain who holds the power to shatter everything they have worked so hard for... including their love.
author: Becca Fitzpatrick
